nodes.text: Dom-Bradden, also known as Bradden, was a planet in the Outer Rim.

In 18 BBY, the Galactic Empire stationed several stormtroopers on the world to be picked up by the Eye of Palpatine, which never arrived. The Eye of Palpatine finally stopped at the planet in 12 ABY, and failing to find the stormtrooper contingent it was looking for, took on board a number of Affytechans whom they attempted to brainwash into being Imperial Navy troopers.
